Module game.py¶

This module contains the game class. This class is responsible for representing a running instance of the game, aswell as implementing the game loop.

class src.game.Game(screen, game_dificulty=GameDificulty.EASY)¶

Class represents a running instance of a game. Every time the game should run, a instance of that class must be created. It holds a lot of instances from other objects, aswell as the game loop.

Parameters:

screen (pg.Surface) – The screen the game should run on.

run(delta_time)¶

Run the game.

Parameters:

delta_time (float) – A variable that will hold the difference of time between every frame update.

Return type:

None

class src.game.GameDificulty(value, names=None, *, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)¶

Enum representing the possible game dificulties.
